sentence.Network_en: Well, so much for the producers. But what of the con-sumers?
sentence.Network_cn: 好吧，关于生产商就讲这么多，那关于消费者呢？

sentence.Network_en: Slimming snacks that offer miraculous weight loss are a con.
sentence.Network_cn: 有神奇减肥效果的瘦身点心是一个骗局。

sentence.Network_en: She travels con-stantly, moving among her several residences around the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 她经常旅行，穿梭于她在世界各地的多处住所。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent. (originally US): abbreviation of confidence, as in confidence trick
early 17th cent.: apparently a weakened form of obsolete cond 'conduct, guide', from Old French conduire, from Latin conducere (see conduce)
Middle English cunne, conne, con, variants of can

entry.def: If someone cons you, they persuade you to do something or believe something by telling you things that are not true.

example.ex: He claimed that the businessman had conned him of £10,000...
example.tran: 他声称那个商人骗了他1万英镑。

example.ex: White conned his way into a job as a ware-houseman with Dutch airline, KLM...
example.tran: 怀特骗到了一份工作，在荷兰皇家航空公司做仓库管理员。

entry.def: A con is a trick in which someone deceives you by telling you something that is not true.

example.ex: Slimming snacks that offer miraculous weight loss are a con...
example.tran: 有神奇减肥效果的瘦身点心是一个骗局。

example.ex: She is the victim of a big con trick.
example.tran: 她是一场大骗局的受害者。

entry.def: A con is the same as a convict .

means.word_mean: 1. an argument opposed to a proposal
2. a person serving a sentence in a jail or prison
3. a swindle in which you cheat at gambling or persuade a person to buy worthless property

sentences.sentence: "He swindled me out of my inheritance"
"She defrauded the customers who trusted her"
"the cashier gypped me when he gave me too little change"

means.word_mean: 2. commit to memory; learn by heart;

sentences.sentence: "Have you memorized your lines for the play yet?"

auth_sentence.content: So the doctor-pay con gets you coming and going.
auth_sentence.res_content: So the doctor-pay con gets you coming and going.

证明……有罪，宣告……有罪，罪犯

sentences.en: The scheme was all a big con.
sentences.cn: 这个计划完全是个大骗局。

sentences.en: The whole thing was a big con,an elaborate put-down on a massive scale.
sentences.cn: 这个事情是一场大骗局,一场精心策划的大规模镇压行动。
